section.title: Specifying Session Timeouts
section.p: To ensure security, inactive browser-sessions should be closed. The maximum inactivity-period is configurable, by means of Couchbase Web Console.
Access the Security panel, by means of the Security tab, at the left-hand side of the console. Then, left-click on the Session tab, at the upper-right:
The Session panel is displayed, as follows:
Enter an appropriate number of minutes into the interactive field. All inactive browser-sessions will be closed after this period.
